description: Worked under the payments and preferences team to support features for Prime Video
Contributing to Modern Carbon Emission Modelling
Developed pathfinding algorithims in ROS. (SLAM - Simultaneous Localization and Mapping)
Develoed responsive user interface leveraging Drupal's theming layer and PHP to create dynamic content.
Synchronised NPC behaviour across clients using mirror and configured REST APIs for inventory transactions.
Assisted students with Discrete Mathematics programming concepts, debugging code, and understanding foundational Computing Science topics.
